titles.title: Helen Keller National Center Reauthorization Act of 2022
Helen Keller National Center Reauthorization Act of 2022
A bill to reauthorize the Helen Keller National Center for Youths and Adults Who Are Deaf-Blind.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Helen Keller National Center Reauthorization Act of 2022
This bill reauthorizes through FY2027 the Helen Keller National Center for Youths and Adults Who Are Deaf-Blind.
